summary: This Restricted Stock Agreement dated November 17, 2025, is between Oncotelic Therapeutics, Inc. and Dr. Vuong Trieu, granting him 24,387.516 shares of Series A Convertible Preferred Stock, convertible into Common Stock, subject to achieving specific corporate milestones. The stock vests upon meeting milestones such as signing Mast Hills, exceeding $100 million in market capitalization, increasing shareholder equity by $10 million, and uplisting to a U.S. national exchange. If milestones are unmet, the stock is forfeited.
